website_summaries.verdict: An excellent budget phone, but unless money is very tight the Redmi Note 9S offers better value still.
cons: MediaTek chip sacrifices performance & battery life

customer_reviews.title: Low budget phone with a mediatek processor which struggles
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately had to return mine within a few days, I have had a few Redmi phones before all with the Snapdragon processor , unfortunately this has the cheaper MediaTek processor which I found to be sluggish and caused the phone to freeze at times, also the camera is not has good as I expected it is quite a low budget phone with less than average specs for the £150+ price tag, I went for a TCL 10 lite smartphone instead which knock this one out of the water
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Good Android phone within budget.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one for my friend. His budget was low but he wanted something updated phone. Found this one and after checking all specifications I ordered it. It is a good phone to use in general usage. Battery life is ok also easy to use. You got all the facilities in this phone. So far performing well. Hopefully it’ll last long.
customer_reviews.author: Rahi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone for the price with cameras better than most high end phones !
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the phone at the price, impressive ! Similar or better spec than phones £500+. It's not perfect, but it's perfect enough for what I need a phone for. The camera quality is excellent from what I've seen so far, but I need to learn how to use them better. Like most modern tech, if you remove all of the pre-installed crap that you don't need, then it will perform better. I recommend this phone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mongy Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the phone as a stopgap until the flagship I want is released and I have to say I’m really impressed by the quality of the phone at such a great price. Never have I been so impressed by a cheap phone. I would highly recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: adrian robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not to get dame adverts all the time and on/off button on top
customer_reviews.text: Had 4 Xiaomi model s always found them to be very good perfere these to other well known make, I can never understand why manufacturers changed to the stupid little plug socket in the phone, the old plug sockets were better ( usb) and it's a shame they don't put the on and off button on the top of the phone ,I wouldn't say the phone is worth five stars, it's not the best I've had, sound on the phone nothing special where as the others had 2 speakers this only has one,
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: By far the best phone I've had in the budget range
customer_reviews.text: What a great phone for the price. It looks and feels nice and is lightening fast. I get 2 days out of the battery with moderate use and s full day with excessive use. Picks up the wifi in the house and I'm getting 115mb download speed from a router giving 100mb! By far the best Phone I've had in the budget range.
customer_reviews.author: John Ronan

customer_reviews.title: Great value budget phone that rivals some of the expensive brands on the market
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14yr old daughter who absolutely loves it, her friend now wants one. I was really pleased with the build quality. I own a galaxy S10+ and am even beginning to doubt how they can justify the price difference. When my contract is up, I'm opting for one of these. Large good quality screen with fantastic battery life. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Chris. S

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone for the price. Needed a reliable substitute for a faulty (expensive) Motorola and this is just the job. Great battery life, absolutely no problems with wifi, camera perfectly adequate, build quality is good. The only slight drawback is that charging is rather slow on the provided charger, but the battery life is such that you won't ge charging it that often! All in all it's a tremendous value package if you don't want to spend ridiculous money on a so-called flagship.
customer_reviews.author: MR R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone, with great features.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone 3 weeks ago. At first I was skeptical because people complained about WiFi issues....so far I've had no WiFi issues. The phone works great (touch wood)...more like apple and Samsung with all the features for a fraction of the price. Really pleased so far, can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and it virtually sets it self up and transfering info and apps from other phone easy
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Jones

customer_reviews.title: Top features and camera at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Totally amazing value for money. Looks good and easily customised. Battery life is really great. I'm usually a Samsung fan and my last phone did charge faster but didn't last as long as the Xiaomi. The camera and features surpassed my expectations. If you want a good value all-rounder I would highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything you'd expect for a low to mid range phone. Camera is excellent, battery life also. The rear is rather naff plastic, but also it in a case and who cares? Delivery was slow to put in the post, but arrived quickly once it was.
customer_reviews.author: Aelfrik Spektor

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: fast charging, great camera, fast working, great price for value, good design
customer_reviews.author: Sveta

customer_reviews.title: Now with a huge 128 Gb storage
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade from my old Moto g3 with 8gb of storage. Also four great cameras
customer_reviews.author: CHEPSTOWMAN

customer_reviews.title: OK phone. Storage lets it down.
customer_reviews.text: One thing I wish I knew before buying is that all app data is stored internally unless the app itself has the option. The only options for the sd card are camera, themes and gallery. WiFi drops and can be infuriatingly slow when downloading large data files.
customer_reviews.author: Nox music

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is fantastic easily lasts the full day. Switched from a Samsung S7 edge to this phone and has all the functionality I would normally use day to day. Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Huxtable

customer_reviews.title: Great value smart phone
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous Redmi and was happy with it, so purchased a more up to date version and can honestly say it does most things that my daughter I phone does but at a much lower price. With so many apps required for work and being in lock down this has been a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone for the price. Good camera. Excellent battery. Fast enough processor. Opens and runs any apps I use quickly enough. Looks quite good in my opinion. Regular software updates. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Im really happy that my battery lasts 3 days without charging! I bought the Band 5 of the Brand and is really cool that the phone got so many option availiable. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: For the price , what's not to like.
customer_reviews.text: Not been a "Tech head" means I will probably never use half of this phones potential.Having owned it for a few months now I can honestly say that so far, I'm impressed .
customer_reviews.author: John Allan Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Battery
customer_reviews.text: I'm experiencing there is something wrong with the battery on my device it may be the make it's self or just mine but it doesn't seem to charge at all even when plugged in it goes down in battery life
customer_reviews.author: Kian Thomas Evans

customer_reviews.title: No earphones? Really?
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with it. It coming with earphones. This is first for me. Phones with no earphones!!! Oh waoh. Other than that. Great front camera. Nice speed too
customer_reviews.author: Keshawn

customer_reviews.title: No NFC
customer_reviews.text: Good, but doesn't have NFC despite what the website says.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the phone, but it's becoming very annoying the fact that it suddenly freezes and reboots out of nowhere. And this happens several times a day...
customer_reviews.author: Marta Onofre

customer_reviews.title: A lot of tech for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Big battery and great camera the rest does what I'd expect it to. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value phone
customer_reviews.text: Love new phone Hi specs for good price Really easy to use, which is why I upgraded from a redmi 5 to the 9
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: an OK phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone, decent battery life and good quality screen. The camera is fairly average, colours seem somewhat washed out and bizarrely appear better in night mode used during the day. The fingerprint sensor works most of the time. Not used NFC yet so cant comment on that. Just had a major system update so support seems good. Overall a decent mid range buy.
customer_reviews.author: A J O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Great great great...
customer_reviews.text: Just brilliant. If like me and you're not a techno head worrying about all the fine details of this or that compared to phones cost two three or four times as much. Then this is the phone for you. Great big screen. Great camera. Awesome battery. Yes it's big but not that big. Good grief for this money who cares about the odd half a mil. Really. All I can say is if you're a realistic sort of person then buy it. Trust me you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Voller

customer_reviews.title: Full of full screen adverts in stock apps
customer_reviews.text: The phone is excellent. It has long battery life and a good camera. The reason I have only given it 4 stars is that when you use some apps (including the Play Store) you will get a really poor looking full screen advert that you have to close. This happens every time you install an app. It is very annoying. If I had known this I would have purchased a different make.
customer_reviews.author: D. Leech

customer_reviews.title: Screen rotating
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find the best phone for me over the last several weeks, and this has been the best thus far, until I notice the screen keep rotating every couple minutes, despite* me removing autorotate. So disappointing. Are all the Redmi phone brands constantly rotating the screen? I wish this wasn't the case, as I found this to be the best of all the recent phones I tried . Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Eiluj-UK

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have had the phone now for over two weeks and comparing to my previous iPhone 6s .the phone is far more superior with its 49 mp camera and its 128gb memory and has a faster internet connection great phone only fault for me is that the phone is a bit on the large side and so not so convenient to carry on your person
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent feature rich smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: I had never come across this brand before but googled budget smart phones. This phone's reviews were superb for the price. Feature packed and very easy to use. Read previous reviews about WiFi issues but I have had none of these. Very happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: For a budget phone this is great. No issues with the screen or performance. Battery life has been great so far too. I was so impressed I bought one for my wife 😁
customer_reviews.author: Alex MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: It's Like I've Always Had it
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, and had no problems whatsoever in getting used to it. All the functions are great, easy to find, and read. Excellent camera, very quick
customer_reviews.author: cassie1

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone battery good last all day camera ok but not as good as I expected would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Spyware and Adverts
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is great, the OS is however not so good. Contains spyware and lots of adverts.
customer_reviews.author: And UK

customer_reviews.title: good quality for less money
customer_reviews.text: Happy with everything. Cam quality is great for me, phone is working fast, finger print reader is working excellent. why to pey double much money for eny brand phone, if you can safe and get good quality for less money
customer_reviews.author: Marina_KVITKA

product_meta.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 4GB/128GB Midnight Grey (Official UK Version)
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Midnight Grey| Size Name:128 GBRedmi Note 9 is the best-in-class midrange hotshot built for those who want a stunning phone with great camera. It’s powered by MediaTek Helio G85 so your phone is always ready for action. On top of that, get a huge battery and fast charging plus a 3.5mm headphone jack, IR blaster, and more.
Redmi Note 9 features an incredible 48MP quad camera setup. Capture ultra-detailed shots with the 48MP primary sensor. Shoot as wide as the eye can see and get awesome portraits with bokeh effects. A new handy document scanner feature is also included to scan documents, notes, receipts, and more.
Redmi Note 9 gives you the power to do more with a longer lasting battery life and 18W fast charging support. Game, surf, or call without having to constantly worry on your battery. Just in case you run out of juice, charge quickly with the included fast charger.
Redmi Note 9 sports an all-new look with the immersive 6.53” DotDisplay protected by a Corning Gorilla Glass 5 in front and a gorgeous symmetrical design with stunning colour options at the back.
feature_bullets: MTK Helio G85, High-performance octa-core processor, Frequency up to 2.0Ghz, GPU: ARM G52 MC2, up to 1000MHz, MediaTek HyperEngine

6.53" DotDisplay, Corning Gorilla Glass 5 front, Resolution:2340x1080 FHD+| 19.5:9, 450nit(typ) brightness, Colour contrast ratio:1500:1(typ), Full Screen gestures, Plastic frame, Splash-proof nano coating
AI quad camera, 48MP main camera, 8MP ultra wide-angle camera, 2MP Macro camera, 2MP depth camera, 13MP In-Display Front Camera
Dual 4G standby, Supports 2+1 card slot, nano-SIM + nano-SIM + microSD, 4G / 3G / 2G, Supports dual SIM VoLTE HD calling
1216 X max0.5mm high amplitude ultra-linear speaker, Smart PA 11V external, pressure boosted, high volume, 3.5mm headphone jack

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
